description: Managed kitchen operations and supervised staff. Designed seasonal menus and optimized ingredient usage to reduce costs.
Led a team of 12+ cooks in a busy chain restaurant. Ensured food quality, hygiene standards, and efficient team collaboration.

Developed and maintained websites using PHP, WordPress, Elementor, HTML, CSS, JS, and jQuery. Focused on delivering user-friendly and visually engaging web solutions. Demonstrated expertise in web development, problem-solving, and attention to detail.
Developing and Maintaining Tour operators system software, Reservation system, Tour CMS, Booking system, and Product for tourism
